Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that former White House staffers have released a "private tape recording" of President Trump.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough evidence or support to prove its validity.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the private tape recording exists and has caused Trump to be silent, without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert provides an alternative explanation by stating that the claim is false and comes from a false headline on an old story.
